title: Can we please have draft mode on normal twisted treeline?
body: It's a fun map to play on, but you always see the same champions on the map, most of which are tanks, and it gets old fast.

replies.body: i agree, they'd have to replace blind pick with it though as the community is not very large. 3v3s are fun and all but playing against certain champions feels very oppressive as there is no/little balancing specific for that mode. (i think i remembered reading a few champions have increased ult cooldowns like syndra) but there's many other champions that prosper greatly off the small map/lane size and reduced player count. if riot doesn't want to try to actively balance those champs it's understandable but i think you should at least get to ban some of the cancer away
It'd kill the queue times even more unfortunately. :/ They won't be able to do it unless TT got a lot more people playing it.

>
> It'd kill the queue times even more unfortunately. :/ They won't be able to do it unless TT got a lot more people playing it.

I feel that part of the queue problem with normal treeline is the fact that there are no bans. I mean I've played a lot of treeline lately, because sometimes you don't want to play a full SR but ARAM isn't appealing either.  I haven't run into any bots, just other players but they all play the same champs like galio, poppy, zac, maokai, yauso--to the point where if you want to queue up in treeline you basically have to assemble a team around the counters to  those champions, which is obnoxious when you just want a quick game to end the night or whatever. 

But I can also see how the draft phase would further deter some people. Idk, I guess there's a lot riot would have to do if they actually wanted treeline to get more play. They don't seem to care much right now.

amen, it is so annoying when every game i try to play there is a mundo, darius and kindred.
it gets so boring after the third time, i need some bans to keep it fun and tactical instead of always playing tanks or tank killers
i only ever see the free rotation champs being played by bots
